hints.title: Exact Momentum Conservation
hints.content:
2913: :label: thm-viscous-momentum-conservation-app
2914: 
2915: The viscous coupling force **exactly conserves total momentum**:
2916: 
2917: $$
2918: \sum_{i=1}^N \mathbf{F}_{\text{viscous}}(x_i, S) = 0
2919: 
2920: $$
2921: 
2922: **Proof**: By symmetry of the kernel $K(x_i - x_j) = K(x_j - x_i)$, each pair $(i, j)$ contributes:
2923: 
2924: $$
2925: K(x_i - x_j)(v_j - v_i) + K(x_j - x_i)(v_i - v_j) = 0
2926: 
2927: $$

hints.label: prop-viscous-energy-dissipation-app
hints.title: Energy Dissipation
hints.content:
2933: :label: prop-viscous-energy-dissipation-app
2934: 
2935: The viscous force **dissipates kinetic energy**:
2936: 
2937: $$
2938: \frac{d E_{\text{kin}}}{dt}\bigg|_{\text{viscous}} = -\frac{\nu m}{2} \sum_{i, j} K(x_i - x_j) \|v_i - v_j\|^2 \leq 0
2939: 
2940: $$

hints.label: thm-viscous-qsd-app
hints.title: Viscous Coupling at QSD
hints.content:
2964: :label: thm-viscous-qsd-app
2965: 
2966: At the quasi-stationary distribution with no bulk flow ($u = 0$) and isotropic velocity distribution, the viscous coupling contributes only to the **effective friction coefficient**:
2967: 
2968: $$
2969: \gamma_{\text{eff}} = \gamma + \Delta \gamma_{\text{viscous}}
2970: 
2971: $$
2972: 
2973: where:
2974: 
2975: $$
2976: \Delta \gamma_{\text{viscous}} = \nu \int K(r) \rho_{\text{QSD}}(r) \, dr > 0
2977: 
2978: $$
2979: 
2980: **Consequence**: The stress-energy tensor at QSD is:
2981: 
2982: $$
2983: T_{\mu\nu}[\mu_{\text{QSD}}] = m\rho \frac{k_B T_{\text{eff}}}{m} g_{\mu\nu}
2984: 
2985: $$
2986: 
2987: where $T_{\text{eff}}$ is determined by the modified fluctuation-dissipation relation:
2988: 
2989: $$
2990: k_B T_{\text{eff}} = \frac{\sigma_v^2 m}{2\gamma_{\text{eff}}}
2991: 
2992: $$
